user_question: What are the different types of forests around the world, and can you generate an image of a mystical forest?
final_answer: Forests around the world include tropical rainforests, temperate forests, boreal forests, and mangrove forests. Image of a mystical forest generated. Tropical rainforests are home to over half of the world's plant and animal species, including a vast array of insects, birds, amphibians, and mammals.
